price: Dijeron: "Construiremos una hoguera y te arrojaremos al fuego llameante".
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
